description:
For more information on DM crafting visit my website:
http://www.thedmscraft.com/

You can pick up the white sand at my Dollar Tree affiliated link:
http://shrsl.com/t32m

Pick up your Hot Wire Foam Factory tools here at my affiliated link:
https://hotwirefoamfactory.com/home.php?bid=6&partner=32240
I used the Freehand Router:
https://hotwirefoamfactory.com/018_Freehand_Router.html?bid=14&partner=32240
I also used the sculpting tool:
https://hotwirefoamfactory.com/K02B_Crafters_Basic_Sculpting_Tool_Kit.html?bid=14&partner=32240
Make sure if you get the sculpting tool you get the tensor piece:
https://hotwirefoamfactory.com/-017-WT-Sculpting-Tool-Wire-Tensioner.html?bid=14&partner=32240

Learn to make snowdrift models for all your miniature 28mm tabletop games such as Dungeons and Dragons and Pathfinder. This easy craft will save you valuable time, so you have more hours to play the games you love. The materials to craft the snowdrifts are also cheap and easy to obtain so this project wonâ€™t break your budget. Bring a few crafting supplies and sit down with DM Scotty to begin your DIY crafting adventure. You can find the tools you need at my website ( http://www.thedmscraft.com/ ). So grab your gluegun and Go Forth and Craft.

The Tabletop Crafters Guild Site:
http://www.tabletopcraftersguild.com/

Become a friend to the Craft and help me bring more content to the community by joining my Patreon. You will have access to exclusive DM Scotty content:  https://www.patreon.com/theDMsCraft?ty=h

Join The Tabletop Crafters Guild Facebook group for more crafts and camaraderie. 
https://www.facebook.com/groups/dmscottyscraftsngames/

Twitter: @TheDMsCraft
title: DIY Snowdrifts & Patches Scatter Terrain (DM's Craft #188)
